context: Pärast is an Estonian adverb and postposition that means 'after', 'afterwards', 'following', 'later', 'past', or 'next'. It can be used to indicate time sequence (something happening after another event) or causation (due to, thanks to). As the elative singular of 'pära' meaning 'back/rear', it literally refers to what comes behind something else in temporal progression.
